column6: "THE CRUELEST CUT" PART 1 (OF 2) Wolverine's 30th Anniversary Celebration starts off with a bang as the X-Men investigate some mysterious murders in New York City. All the victims seem to have been cut to pieces by blades-Adamantium blades! But if Wolveri
